abstract: China Construction Bank, the world’s second-largest lender by market value, said on Monday it would be “reasonable” for major shareholder Bank of America  to reduce its stake to 10 percent.
lead_paragraph: China Construction Bank, the world’s second-largest lender by market value, said on Monday it would be “reasonable” for major shareholder Bank of America  to reduce its stake to 10 percent.

headline.main: C.C.B. Says 10% Bank of America Stake Is ‘Reasonable’
